questions:

B) A statue
C) A building
D) A person

B) A human
C) A mythical creature
D) An abstract form

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is the texture of the statue?

C) Scaly
D) Metallic

B) Buildings
C) Mountains
D) Sky
